NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Mechanical and Publications or the cell corresponding to Aerospace and Testing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Aerospace} and {Testing} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.40 to 0.51?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Computer, Collaboration), (Computer, Commercialization), (Computer, Development), (Computer, Funding), (Computer, Innovation), (Computer, Maintenance), (Computer, Publications), (Computer, Testing)}.
